name: cci
body:
CREATE CLUSTERED INDEX $CURSOR$
ON -- table | view ( column1 [ ASC | DESC ], ..., columnN ( ASC | DESC ] )
--WITH PAD_INDEX
--    | FILLFACTOR = fillfactor
--    | IGNORE_DUP_KEY
--    | DROP_EXISTING
--    | STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE
--    | SORT_IN_TEMPDB, .. as required
-- ON filegroup
GO
